ygData.subject: Re: PC Locking up please help
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that I m knowledgable but it s usually easier to eliminate the possibility of software. Directx 7 and if that s already okay-- maybe uninstall/reinstall of
ygData.messageBody:
Not that I'm knowledgable but it's usually easier
to eliminate the possibility of software. Directx 7
and if that's already okay-- maybe
uninstall/reinstall of EQ. Maybe something glitched on install. --
it's a pain redoing the patches... but... Could solve
the issue. Also, maybe it's an issue with drivers?
Reset to VGA mode and then reinstall the drivers...
might work. Or get latest drivers if that doesn't
work.<br><br>Those are the things I'd try first at any rate... of
course if anyone knows of an actual issue with those
cards and EQ... forget about me. =)<br><br>shooman
out...<br><br>FatedHue, Druid of the 5th, hopeful future member of
Infinity's Edge on Drinal.
